conclusion: Determine the output power by finding the intersection of the two lines.
Line I represents the relationship between terminal voltage and current for the power source.
Equation for Line I is U = -0.5I + 3.
Line II represents the volt-ampere characteristic of the resistor.
Equation for Line II is U = I.
Intersection point found at I = 2 A and U = 2 V.
Calculate output power P = UI = 4 W.
